name: King of Bears
description:
# Description

The king of all bears. It has the power to generate more honey for  its own consumption.

### Contributor

Sunflower Land is a community game built by a hundreds of developers and artists across the globe.
Come join us on [Github](https://github.com/sunflower-land/sunflower-land)

attributes.trait_type: Increase Honey Yield per full beehive
